# python 
import os
os.getuid()
os.geteuid()
os.getuid()
os.seteuid()

# Difference between setuid() and seteuid()
setuid() -- 身分改變 (變不回去, root -> 1008), 此時uid and euid都是1008
seteuid() -- 職務改變, 身分不變 (root --> 1008 --> root), 此時uid是0, euid是1008

# status of process
cat /proc/16882/status
